November 22, 1952
Mr. Gray&on Ausmus, Director

Manager | VUOA(FM)
University, Alabama
Dear Graydons
Suggest simple procedure. Have secretary type
up charges for a given period, as bill against
NAEB. Have President Ausmus sign hie approval
on the 8amÂ© statement* Tranemit check directly
if he has her address ~~ and telephone number.
While I*m suggesting, suggest payments on a
monthly basis, calendar month, makes it easier
on the treasurer, but suggestion can easily be
overruled.
Regards,
Frank E, Schooley
Treasurer
P.S. Wilbur will be here when you are here.
